events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and the tracking still says the package is being prepared. I expected the delivery by now but haven't received any updates.
The system has identified the issue as a delivery delay due to keywords like 'tracking' and 'delivery' mentioned by the customer.
The case has been assigned to delivery support agent Alex for further investigation and response.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear your order hasn’t arrived yet. Let me check the status for you right away.
Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the order so I can look into it more effectively?
Sure, the order number is 123456789, and the email I used is customeremail@example.com. Please let me know what you find out.
Thank you for the details. We’ve checked with our shipping partner and there appears to be a delay due to unforeseen logistic issues. Your package should arrive within the next 3 days.
I appreciate the update and the estimated delivery time. I hope it arrives soon as I really need the product for an upcoming event.
We will monitor your shipment and follow up if there are any further issues. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
Just checking in to confirm if your order has arrived as expected. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory or if you need further assistance.
Yes, the package arrived today and everything is in good condition. Thanks for your help resolving this promptly.
We are glad to hear your order arrived safely. Closing this case now, and please don’t hesitate to reach out in the future.
We have sent a short survey to gather your feedback about your experience with our delivery support.
